title: aDaindEn unnai anbuDan
sahitya:
aDaindEn unnai anbuDan ayyA AdarittaruLAyE paramA


anupallavi

  kaDait-tEriDa un karuNai allAl vazhi kANEn en kaNmaNiyE ini nAn


caraNam    vAninri bhUmi vaLarvadum uNDO maNNinrip-payirO payirinri uyirO
nAnena uyirkkum nIyanri nAnAr jnAna shikhAmaNIyE naTarAjA
